title: On My Way with Irina Rimes
overview: What do you do when you feel like you've lost your inspiration? When you feel like you're moving away from your essence and losing yourself? After two years of working frantically, Irina Rimes feels the need for a change in order to find herself again. With the support of the music label she's signed to, Global Records, Irina goes on the road for two weeks, traveling in a mobile studio through six cities, in order to complete her album Home. Bucharest, Brasov, Piatra Neamt, Iasi, Chisinau, and Izvoare as the final destination. Her personal and professional life come together and at the end she's able to find closure and the way back home.
